text: Meir Banai (; 5 July 1961 - 12 January 2017) was an Israeli musician, singer, and songwriter. He was a pop, rock and soul musician. He released ten albums, starting in 1984. He was best known his 2007 album Shma Koli, which had traditional Jewish texts and prayers in the music. He was born in Beersheba. Banai died from cancer on 12 January 2017 in Ganot. He was 55. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Israeli pop singers Category:Israeli singer-songwriters Category:Jewish Israeli musicians Category:People from Beer Sheba Category:Pop musicians Category:Rock musicians Category:Rock singers Category:Soul musicians
title: Meir Banai
